style.css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain(bbs.archlinux.org){input, textarea, select {color: #CFCFCF;background-color: #0D0D0D;border-color: #353535;-moz-appearance: none !important;} html, body, .pun {background-color: #0B0B0B !important;color: #A5A5A5 !important;} .pun .punwrap {background-color: #0D0D0D !important;border-top-color: #1A2229 !important;border-right-color: #1A2229 !important;border-bottom-color: #1A2229 !important;border-left-color: #1A2229 !important;color: #6A788B !important;} #brdtitle #brddesc, .pun .pagepost, #brdstats #onlinelist, #brdfooter #searchlinks, #brdfooter #modcontrols, #punmaint h2, #punredirect h2, #adminconsole .submittop, .pun #debugtime, .pun .pagelink a, .pun .pagelink * {border-top-color: #293137 !important;border-right-color: #293137 !important;border-bottom-color: #293137 !important;border-left-color: #293137 !important;} .pun a, .pun a:link, .pun a:visited {color: #3873BA !important;} .pun a:hover, .pun a:active, .pun a:focus {color: #E72724 !important;} .pun .postmsg .postimg a:link img, .pun .postmsg .postimg a:visited img {border-top-color: #5084C2 !important;border-right-color: #5084C2 !important;border-bottom-color: #5084C2 !important;border-left-color: #5084C2 !important;} .pun .postmsg .postimg a:hover img, .pun .postmsg .postimg a:active img, .pun .postmsg .postimg a:focus img {border-top-color: #E72724 !important;border-right-color: #E72724 !important;border-bottom-color: #E72724 !important;border-left-color: #E72724 !important;} #brdmenu {background-color: #919191 !important;} #brdmenu a, #brdmenu a:link, #brdmenu a:visited {background-color: #919191 !important;border-top-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-right-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-top-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-right-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-bottom-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-left-color: #D1E7FF !important;color: #D1E7FF !important;} .pun .blocktable .box {background-color: #070707 !important;border-top-color: #293137 !important;border-right-color: #151A1E !important;border-bottom-color: #293137 !important;border-left-color: #151A1E !important;} #punindex .blocktable h2, .pun #vf h2 {color: #5B99AE !important;} #adminconsole fieldset th, #adminconsole fieldset td {background-color: #0B0B0B !important;border-top-color: #0F1319 .blocktable td {border-top-color: #0F1319 !important;border-right-color: #0F1319 !important;border-bottom-color: #0F1319 !important;border-left-color: #0F1319 !important;} .pun .blocktable th {background-color: #141414 !important;border-top-color: #1A2229 !important;border-right-color: #1A2229 !important;border-bottom-color: #1A2229 !important;border-left-color: #1A2229 !important;color: #5B99AE !important;} .pun .blocktable td.tcl span.stickytext {color: #367699 !important;} .pun .blockpost {background-color: #0B0B0B !important;border-top-color: #293137 !important;border-right-color:
